channel.title: Cordinates
channel.description:
on most server i've downloaded and played with in the past when you click the run icon have like the XY cords up at the top well i started with a blank source and i don't got a coordinates command or anything that tell me the cords can someone help me either put one in my server like msst server have or make a command that tell me the coordinates
I need this asap i plan to open my server soon ^^ :D

item.title: Cordinates
item.dc:creator: @legendmaker legendmaker
item.description:
@legendmaker wrote:

ty porb solved `Rich ty so much man

Read full topic

item.title: Cordinates
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) { sendMessage("X: "+absX+" Y: "+absY+""); }

Read full topic
